name: Ian Eisele
title: Laboratory Informatics Scientist
bio: I'm an Informatics Scientist with a passion for leveraging technology to solve complex scientific challenges. My expertise spans CDS software, Python development, analytics, and machine learning applications in scientific contexts.

With a strong foundation in chromatography and data analysis, I bridge the gap between domain expertise and software solutions. I enjoy building tools and systems that help scientists and researchers work more efficiently.
